original_text: So I say, ‘My dear people, show that you are sorry. Wear sackcloth and sit in ashes. Weep and cry aloud, as if your only child had died. Realize that the enemy's army will soon be here and they are ready to destroy us.’ So I say, ‘My dear people, show that you are sorry. Wear sackcloth and sit in ashes. Weep and cry aloud, as if your only child had died. Realize that the enemy's army will soon be here and they are ready to destroy us.’ So I say, ‘My dear people, show that you are sorry.
korean_text: 딸 내 백성이 굵은 베를 두르고 재에서 구르며 독자를 잃음 같이 슬퍼하며 통곡할지어다 멸망시킬 자가 갑자기 우리에게 올 것임이라

sentences.original_text: as if your only child had died
sentences.korean_translation: 마치 당신의 유일한 자식이 죽은 것처럼

sentences.original_text: Realize that the enemy's army will soon be here
sentences.korean_translation: 원수의 군대가 곧 여기에 올 것임을 깨달아라

sentences.original_text: and they are ready to destroy us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 우리를 파괴할 준비가 되어있다
